title: Foods You Eat When Sick, Michael Cohen, What It Was, Ellen DeGeneres, Reality Update, Oscars, Sand and Soul, Closing Remarks and more.
itunes:title: Foods You Eat When Sick, Michael Cohen, What It Was, Ellen DeGeneres, Reality Update, Oscars, Sand and Soul, Closing Remarks and more.
description:
Happy Thursday y'all. Do you remember what your mom fed you when you were sick? Michael Cohen only got three years during sentencing. Ellen DeGeneres maybe retiring. Today Miss Carla talks about Real Housewives of Atlanta along with Nephew Tommy and Ready To Love. The Academy has been struggling to find a replacement host since Kevin Hart stepped down. The 3rd annual Sand and Soul is coming and The CEO personally tells you what to expect. Closing Remarks today covers those that are in your life that are taking more than they are putting in and how to deal with them. Enjoy!!!

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
